title: IOICamp Sequence
text:
Let's say we have 4 N-elements sequences of real numbers: A[], B[], C[], D[] .Funtion F(i, j) is defined: F(i, j) = |Ai- Aj| + |Bi- Bj| + |Ci- Cj| + |Di- Dj| (1 ≤ i, j ≤ N).Your task is very easy: you have to find the maximum of F(i, j).InputThe first line: N (N ≤ 100000).Following are N lines: the i-th line contains four real numbers Ai, Bi, Ci, Di. (-109≤ Ai, Bi, Ci, Di≤ 109)OutputOnly one line is the maximum of F(i, j).(The result takes exactly 3 decimal places)ExampleInput:2
1.0 1.0 2.0 0.5
1.0 1.0 0.5 2.0Output:3.000
